Question.Subject: How do you get more followers on Tumblr?
Question.Content:
taylorbaton.tumblr.com
I post a lot of random rant entries about pretty much everything and post a lot of quites and just random pictures of everything and anything, music, youtube videos, pretty much anything I can think of that's interesting or inpsiring. How can I somehow get more people to follow me? I only have 12 followers right now... baha, it feels really pathetic...
Question.ChosenAnswer: I just made a tumblr a couple of hours ago and i love it! mines http://bobbing4apples.tumblr.com Don't worry I think I only have one follower ahaha. plz follow me i'll return the favor(:

Answer.Content:
I know, I wish I knew how to get people to follow me too. Lol, but I just post music and pictures I've taken, so yeah...
Well, here's mine anyways for anyone who cares: twmcey.tumblr.com
I just made a tumblr a couple of hours ago and i love it! mines http://bobbing4apples.tumblr.com Don't worry I think I only have one follower ahaha. plz follow me i'll return the favor(:
